reference.title: Extending the XML Catalog
reference.shortdesc: The XML Catalogs extension point is used to update the XML Catalogs used to resolve DTD or Schema document types, or to add URI mappings.

section.p: To do this, first create a catalog with only your new values, using the OASIS Catalog format, and place that in your plug-in. Local file references in the catalog should be relative to the location of the catalog. The following extension points are available to work with catalogs.

dd.p: Adds the content of the catalog file defined in file attribute to main DITA-OT catalog file.
dd.note: The dita.specialization.catalog extension is deprecated. Use dita.specialization.catalog.relative instead.

dd.p: Adds the content of the catalog file defined in file attribute to main PDF plug-in catalog file.
